hero.title: IconHash
hero.subtitle: A powerful tool for calculating favicon hashes used in cybersecurity reconnaissance
hero.description: Calculate MMH3 (MurmurHash3) hash of favicons for finding similar websites in cybersecurity research

multipleInputs.title: Multiple Input Sources
multipleInputs.description: Process favicons from URLs, local files, or base64 encoded data

multipleOutputs.title: Multiple Output Formats
multipleOutputs.description: Get results as plain hash, Fofa format, or Shodan format

apiServer.title: HTTP API Server
apiServer.description: Run as a server with RESTful API endpoints

mcpSupport.title: AI Integration
mcpSupport.description: Model Context Protocol support for AI integration

cli.title: Modern CLI
cli.description: Intuitive command-line interface with rich documentation

fromSource.title: From Source
fromSource.description: Clone the repository and build the binary

hashFromUrl.title: Hash from URL
hashFromUrl.description: Calculate hash from a website favicon URL

hashFromFile.title: Hash from File
hashFromFile.description: Calculate hash from a local favicon file

hashFromBase64.title: Hash from Base64
hashFromBase64.description: Calculate hash from base64 encoded data

api.title: API Reference
api.description: The iconhash tool includes an HTTP API server that allows you to calculate favicon hashes via HTTP requests
api.base64Desc: Calculate hash from base64 encoded data
api.authDescription: If an authentication token is set, all requests (except /health) must include the token in one of these ways:
api.authNote: Authentication is optional. When the server is started with an auth token, all API endpoints (except health check) will require authentication. This provides security for your API service.

mcp.title: Model Context Protocol
mcp.description: The iconhash tool supports the Model Context Protocol, which allows integration with AI services

reconnaissance.title: Cybersecurity Reconnaissance
reconnaissance.description: Find websites with the same favicon in search engines

integration.title: Integration with Other Tools
integration.description: Build automation scripts and security scanning tools

ai.title: AI Integration
ai.description: Create conversational interfaces and intelligent security tools
